Guard Weisz:
They say Giran is the wealthiest region in the kingdom. Once, I traveled to Giran escorting the coaches of some traders, and their market was enormous. Traders from all over the continent were selling all sorts of novelties. I am thinking of going back there someday to buy a dress of Avella silk for my wife.
Return

Guard Weisz:
Be careful! This place is very crowded because of construction on the village wall. Wooden props may collapse or bricks may fall, so be on alert.
Many are experiencing discomfort due to the construction. In particular, the Traders from Giran have many complaints. I hope the construction is finished quickly so that the travelers can enter the village through a proper gate.
Ask about Giran.
Ask about Forgotten Temple.
Ask about the local lord and tax rate.
Quest

Guard Weisz:
Recently a very interesting archeological site has been discovered whose origins are still unclear. People who have seen it say that it is divided in two, a Temple of Fire and a Temple of Water. By all accounts the place is swarming with monsters.
If you are interested, you should visit Magister Nell of the Mystics Guild. They are trying to hire someone to investigate the site for them.
Return
